name: AVMusicSequenceLoadOptions
desc: A structure that defines whether data on different MIDI channels map to multiple tracks, or whether the framework preserves the tracks as they are.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static var smf_ChannelsToTracks: AVMusicSequenceLoadOptions
items.desc: An option that represents data on different MIDI channels mapped to multiple tracks.
